action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ ▢ X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X X X X X

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 matrix. The top and bottom rows are completely filled with Xs. The second and fourth rows have four empty squares (▢) followed by an X. The third row has two empty squares, followed by three Xs.

- The first and last columns are filled with Xs, except for the middle cell of the first column and the middle cell of the last column, which are empty.
- The second and fourth rows have Xs in the first and last cells, with empty cells in between.
- The third row has Xs in the first, third, and fifth cells, with empty cells in between.
- The middle cell
